info.name: ISH - Insurance Service Hub
info.description: A comprehensive collection for testing the Insurance Service Hub (ISH) application flow.

item.name: 1. User Management

request.description: Register a new user in the system. The response will include a user ID and a message to check email for temporary password.

response.name: Success Response
response.body: User is registered with Id value:: 2 - check mail for temp password

request.description: Activate a user account using the temporary password received via email. Replace {{temp_password}} with the actual temporary password.

response.name: Success Response
response.body: User is activated with new Password

exec: // Store user ID if available in the response

request.description: Login with user credentials. This endpoint will authenticate the user and return user information.
Get user profile information by email and name.

item.description: User registration, activation, and authentication endpoints

item.name: 2. Worker Management

request.description: Register a new worker (case worker) in the system. The response will include a worker ID and a message to check email for temporary password.

response.name: Success Response
response.body: Worker is registered with Id value:: 2 - check mail for temp password

request.description: Activate a worker account using the temporary password received via email. Replace {{worker_temp_password}} with the actual temporary password.

response.name: Success Response
response.body: Worker is activated with new Password

request.description: Login with worker credentials. This endpoint will authenticate the worker and return worker information.

item.description: Worker (case worker) registration, activation, and authentication endpoints

item.name: 3. Application Registration

request.description: Register a new citizen application for health insurance. The response will include an application ID.

response.name: Success Response
response.body: citizen application is registered with id::1000

item.description: Citizen application registration for health insurance

item.name: 4. Data Collection

request.description: Generate a case number for the application. Replace {{application_id}} with the actual application ID.
Get all available plan names.
Update plan selection for the case. Replace {{case_number}} with the actual case number.
Save income details for the case. Replace {{case_number}} with the actual case number.
Save education details for the case. Replace {{case_number}} with the actual case number.
Save children details for the case. Replace {{case_number}} with the actual case number.

item.description: Collection of applicant data including income, education, and dependents

item.name: 5. Eligibility Determination

request.description: Determine eligibility for the case. Replace {{case_number}} with the actual case number.

item.description: Determine eligibility for health insurance based on collected data

item.name: 6. Benefit Issuance

request.description: Send benefits to eligible beneficiaries.

item.description: Manage the issuance of benefits to eligible applicants

request.description: Process correspondence triggers to send notifications to applicants.

item.name: 8. Admin Operations

request.description: Get all plan categories.
Register a new health insurance plan.

response.name: Success Response
response.body: Plan is saved with  id value52

item.description: Administrative functions for managing plans and system configuration
